title: Get Off Your Phone
itunes:title: Get Off Your Phone
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners thought it was okay for basketball player Amir Johnson to pull out his phone during the playoff game, as it his headlines this weekend. Moreover, speaking of phone use we also had author and professor Cal Newport stop by where he spoke about quitting social media, and the effects social media has on the mind and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Fox news host Laura Ingraham for making jokes about the great Nipsey Hussle. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
